title: Koala 🐨
caption: Funky koala face to understand how to draw basic shapes using CSS

title: Sail a boat ⛵
caption: Illustration of a sea scape premiered by Scott Tusk on dribble. Responds to view port dimensions and adjusts the scene.

title: CSS Menu 🧭
caption: A simple navigation menu that reveals the menu items on hover action. Adding accessibility support is pending.

title: CSS Tabset 🗂️
caption: Tabbed navigation component implemented using CSS sibiling selector and radio button checked state.
